column4: can someone recommend a fully free (ie, without a clickwrap licence) java implimentation? I'm remastering a disk i might distribute
does that include plugins for firefox?
Google suggests there is an OpenJDK Firefox plugin, some reports of problems.
fair enough. I'll use sun java for the internal version and test openjdk later ;p
the plug-in might still be in the separate "Iced Tea" project that was completing the Java parts that weren't yet open sourced.  Good luck.
